abstract: The European Aeronautic Defense and Space Company said that it planned to pursue other work from the Pentagon to build its American operations.
snippet: The European Aeronautic Defense and Space Company said that it planned to pursue other work from the Pentagon to build its American operations.
lead_paragraph: The European contractor that lost a bid to build Air Force refueling tankers said on Friday that it would not protest the decision, ending years of struggle that had highlighted flaws in the Pentagon’s contracting procedures.

headline.main: EADS Won’t Protest Loss of Tanker Contract to Boeing
headline.print_headline: EADS Won’t Protest Decision On Military Tanker Contract

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
